#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Would you mind if I take a photo ?
#Text=Absolutely not .
#Text=Interview with freelancer comic writer John Layman
#Text=Freelance comic writer John Layman .
#Text=Image : Acagastya .
#Text=( Reuseterms . )
#Text=How did you get into comics ?
#Text=My first job , I moved to San Diego because that is where the comic book con is .

#Text=After college , I moved to San Diego , at it was much smaller , but I did n't know how to get into comics because it was the pre internet or internet was just coming in to being and it was like 1990 .
#Text=So I got a job at the newspaper , and I would do geek stories .
#Text=Whenever like Spawn had a TV show , or Judge Dredd had a movie or the Comic Con rolled in town , I would write an article about it .
#Text=And eventually I attracted attention of the local comic book company which was Jim Lee 's WildStorm productions .
#Text=They hired me as an assistant editor and then I worked my way up to editor , and then DC bought us .
#Text=And suddenly I was a DC editor .
#Text=So I had done that for about five years and then I had always wanted to write , I figured I knew how so I went freelance and then I started writing in about 2001 .
#Text=And I have been writing ever since .
#Text=What other companies do you have worked for ?
#Text=DC , Marvel , Dark Horse , IDW , Avatar , Dark Horse , Dynamite , ... [ a fellow volunteer suggests X-Men ]
#Text=well , companies , like Boom !
#Text=I have basically worked for every , nearly every major comic book company in America .
#Text=Why did you choose freelancing and not stick to one company ?
#Text=Because I do n't want to work for a boss .
#Text=I do n't want to wear pants .
#Text=I do n't want people to tell me what to do .
#Text=Like if I do n't want a job , I can just [ shows middle finger ]
#Text=you know , I can just walk away .
#Text=But , it 's hard because if you do n't have work , you do n't get paid .
#Text=So you are always hustling .
#Text=But there is a freedom of being your own boss .
#Text=If you had an option , like , if there was no one to command you , would you still continue freelancing ?
#Text=I , no .

#Text=I actually , a few years ago , I got a company job and after being freelancer , like no I do n't wan na go into an office , I do n't wan na do hours , like you get being used to be your own boss , I could never go back to a real job .
#Text=Which is the first character you 'd created when you were a kid ?
#Text=Oh !
#Text=You know , I ca n't — that 's been so long ago I do n't even keep track that anymore .

#Text=I mean I had some old dumb things that I do n't even pay attention to anymore because I look back at them and they are so amateurish , you know I do n't have a certain character I have created at an age that I remember .
